attributes.action: Exempt certain types of  Euro 5 diesels vehicles From CAZ Tarriffs
attributes.additional_details: We call on the government to include any euro 5 diesels which don't pay road tax due to there low limits to be excempt from CAZ as there limits are almost euro 6.
attributes.background: The CAZ zone D (clean air zones) excempt euro 6 diesels from paying the charge even through some big engines new ones will probably emit more harm than some euro 5 diesels which where mainly produced between 2012-2014 which are free road tax due to the low emissions are just as clean.

rejection.details:
Decisions about the specific inclusions and exclusions of clean air zones are the responsibility of local councils, not the UK Government or Parliament. 

You could start a petition asking for the Government framework for clean air zones to be amended, to include specific types of euro 5 diesel cars, if that's something that you'd like to happen.
